quote: As you know, I have General Kelly here.  We stopped traffic coming through -- 78 percent.  It’s going to be, I think, 81 percent this quarter, which is a record.
quotePlain: As you know, I have General Kelly here.  We stopped traffic coming through – 78 percent.  It’s going to be, I think, 81 percent this quarter, which is a record.
name: Donald Trump
where: joint press conference with President Niinistö of Finland

claims.truth: The real number is 46% for July 2016 vs. July 2017
